content: *classically styled this crochet vest is a classic destined for years of wear and enjoyment lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # cfw-aranvest corrections applied nov 27 2005 skill level intermediate size small medium large 1x finished chest 41 46 50 55 inches 150-098 fishermen s wool yarn natural 3-4 balls crochet hook - size i-9 nine 7/8-inch 22 mm buttons special stitch front-post double_crochet fpdc pieces left front right front back 2 large pockets 1 small pocket recommended block before seaming pieces together
